# Scraping Data

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2025.shtml"
html <- read_html(url)
newdata <- html %>% html_table(fill=TRUE)
newdata

install.packages("Lahman")
library(Lahman)
View(LahmanData)

left_join(LahmanData, newdata, by = "Name")
```
